text: A meadow is a field vegetated primarily by grass and other non-woody plants. It may be cut or grazed by livestock such as cattle, sheep or goats. ==Related pages== * Pasture * Plain * Plateau * Prairie * Savanna * Steppe * Tundra * Field == References == * Cornell University * The Washington Post, "Today, 32,000 seedlings; tomorrow, a meadow" == Other websites == * UK Wild Meadows Website * Irish Wild Meadows Website * Flora locale - information on creating wildflower meadows * Meadow Planting * A Year in a Meadow (Ottawa Canada) * Grow a Back Yard Meadow (Ottawa Canada) Category:Grasslands
title: Meadow
